mapper.select: SELECT id, dict_name AS dictName, dict_code AS dictCode, status, description, create_time AS createTime, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM t_dictionary_item ORDER BY create_time DESC OFFSET #{currentPage} LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT id, dict_sub_name AS dictSubName, dict_sub_code AS dictSubCode, dict_value AS dictValue, description, dict_id AS dictId, create_time AS createTime FROM t_dictionary_value WHERE dict_id = #{dictId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_dictionary_value WHERE dict_id = #{dictId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_dictionary_item WHERE id = #{id}; DELETE FROM t_dictionary_value WHERE dict_id = #{id};
